voice_instruct: A young man in his early twenties with a cracked, intense tenor. Raw emotion barely held in check. The voice of someone who has been broken by slavery and grief but refuses to stay down. Spoken word with military cadence that fractures into vulnerability. Think a young soldier who has seen too much death and carries every lost life as personal failure. Darkeyed intensity, windswept and desperate.

tracks.title: Shash
tracks.prompt: atmospheric post-rock, young male vocals, tremolo guitars, slow build to wall of sound, Mogwai meets Sigur Ros, E minor, 74 BPM, desolate and windswept, reverb-drenched crescendo
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
they branded me with shash, the glyph for dangerous
burned it on my forehead so the world could read my sin
a surgeon's son who picked up a spear instead of thread
and every life I tried to save became a life I led to dead

Tien was twelve years old, he had rocks in both his pockets
smooth ones, colored ones, he said the light lived in them
they put him in the front line with a wooden stick for weapon
and I was twenty feet away and could not reach him

[chorus]
I am dangerous, that is what the brand says
I am dangerous, that is what the scar reads
but the danger was never in my hands
the danger is that I keep surviving when better men do not

[verse 2]
Amaram wore my brothers' blood like a promotion
he took my Blade, he took my men, he took my name
he told the world I was a deserter, told them I was nothing
and they believed him because lighteyes never carry blame

four years a slave, four years of bridges on my back
carrying the dead across the chasms in the rain
they send us first to catch the arrows, that is all we are
human shields who run the Parshendi gauntlet, scar by scar

[bridge]
shash, shash, the glyph that marks the forehead
shash, shash, the brand that never heals
but what they wrote in pain I will rewrite in purpose
the dangerous man is the one who learns to feel

[chorus]
I am dangerous, that is what the brand says
I am dangerous, that is what the scar reads
but the danger was never in my hands
the danger is that I keep surviving when better men do not

tracks.title: The Bridgeman's Run
tracks.prompt: driving post-rock with percussion, young male vocals, pounding drums and bass, building intensity, Explosions in the Sky meets Godspeed You Black Emperor, A minor, 82 BPM, desperate urgency, war march into crescendo
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
side carry, that was how it started, turning the bridge sideways
so the arrows hit the wood instead of us
such a simple thing, such a stupid simple thing
and Gaz looked at me like I had spoken treason

but Rock was grinning underneath the bridge rail
and Teft was nodding like he remembered something
and Lopen, one-armed Lopen, said, sure, gancho
like surviving was the easiest idea in the world

[chorus]
run, bridgemen, run across the plateau
the Parshendi arrows singing, the chasm deep below
run, bridgemen, run, the living and the dead
we are Bridge Four and we carry more than bridges on our heads

[verse 2]
I taught them spear forms in the barracks after dark
kata one through five, the way my father never wanted
Rock cooked stew from cremling claws and lavis grain
and Maps drew lines of the plateaus we had haunted

Dunny died on plateau assault the fourteenth week
he was seventeen, he liked to sing off-key at night
I carried him back across the chasm on my shoulder
and I swore an oath to every god that this was not all right

[bridge]
thirteen men at the start, I memorized their names
I scratched them in the stone beneath my bunk
some of them are dead now and some of them are free
and some of them became the best soldiers anyone has ever seen

[chorus]
run, bridgemen, run across the plateau
the Parshendi arrows singing, the chasm deep below
run, bridgemen, run, the living and the dead
we are Bridge Four and we carry more than bridges on our heads

tracks.title: Syl
tracks.prompt: ethereal post-rock, young male vocals, shimmering guitars, windchimes and ambient pads, Hammock meets This Will Destroy You, C major, 70 BPM, luminous and fragile, breath of wind through strings
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
she came to me as a whisper of blue light in the rain
a spren like any other spren, a windspren with no name
but she would stay when others scattered, she would hover near
and when I counted bodies on the bridge she wiped my tear

I did not know what she was then, I did not know what I could be
an honor spren, the last to bond since the Recreance set them free
she chose me in the slave pits when my honor was a thread
she bet everything on a broken man the rest of Roshar left for dead

[chorus]
Syl, you are the wind in every oath I speak
Syl, you are the reason that I climb when I am weak
when I forget who I am supposed to be
you flicker at the edge of sight and I remember me

[verse 2]
the Stormfather calls her child, she crossed into this realm
and every oath I swear makes her more real, more at the helm
a Shardblade formed from living trust, from covenant, from choice
not dead like all the screaming ones, alive with her own voice

but when I break, she fades, she dims, she cannot hear my call
the Words are bridges and the silence is the fall
I felt her vanish in the tower when the darkness took my chest
and every windspren in the sky went hollow with the rest

[bridge]
life before death, she whispers
strength before weakness
journey before destination
and I say the words because without them she is gone
and without her I am just a man with brands on his head

[chorus]
Syl, you are the wind in every oath I speak
Syl, you are the reason that I climb when I am weak
when I forget who I am supposed to be
you flicker at the edge of sight and I remember me

tracks.title: Honor Is Dead
tracks.prompt: dark intense post-rock, young male vocals, distorted guitar swells, military snare, Mogwai meets Neurosis, D minor, 78 BPM, furious and despairing, storm breaking
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
I dropped into the arena with a sky full of lighteyes watching
four Shardbearers against one man with a side carry and a grudge
Adolin was down, his Plate was cracked, the crowd was gasping
and I jumped in because someone had to and no one else would budge

honor is dead, I told Elhokar, honor died with every bridgeman
honor died with Dunny, honor died with Tien
honor died in Amaram's tent when he stole my friends' last breath
and called it necessary and walked clean into the light again

[chorus]
honor is dead but I will see what I can do
I will stand for the man beside me, I will stand for you
not because the world is just, not because the cause is true
honor is dead but I will see what I can do

[verse 2]
the Blade screamed when it hit my arm, the pain was white and vast
the dead spren inside the weapon crying for a bond long past
I held the line with borrowed armor and a stolen spear
and every lighteyes in that crowd remembered what it means to fear

Syl became a lance, a hammer, then a blade of living light
the first true Shardblade in a thousand years, and in my hand, it felt right
the Assassin in White could not touch me, Szeth could not understand
how a slave from the bridges held the storm inside his hand

[bridge]
I did not fight for honor, I fought because they needed me
I fought because Rock cooked for us, because Teft believed in me
because Lopen lost an arm and cracked a joke about it
because Bridge Four was family and family does not quit

[chorus]
honor is dead but I will see what I can do
I will stand for the man beside me, I will stand for you
not because the world is just, not because the cause is true
honor is dead but I will see what I can do

tracks.title: The Tower
tracks.prompt: crushing post-rock crescendo, young male vocals, layered guitars building to massive peak, drums accelerating, Russian Circles meets Mono, F minor, 76 BPM, betrayal and rage, walls of distortion
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
Sadeas pulled his army off the Tower plateau and left us there
twenty thousand soldiers watching Bridge Four die in open air
this was always his plan, the joint assault was always a lie
and Dalinar Kholin's army was arranged to watch and die

I felt it hit, the understanding, like a highstorm through the chest
we were bait, we were always bait, we were never anything less
the bridgemen and the Kholin troops, expendable by name
and Sadeas rode home through the permanent plateaus without a stain of shame

[chorus]
turn back, turn back, every part of me says run
the bridges are behind us and the battle is undone
but Dalinar is fighting and his men are going to fall
and I cannot be the man who walks away, I cannot walk at all

[verse 2]
we went back, Bridge Four turned around and we went back
across the chasm, arrows flying, Parshendi on the attack
Rock and Teft and Skar and Moash, Sigzil counting every stride
Lopen with one arm still carrying his share of the divide

I felt the wind obey me and the stormlight fill my veins
I leaped across the chasm like the sky had cut my chains
and the Words came out like breathing, I will protect those who cannot protect themselves
and Syl became a Blade and I became someone else

[bridge]
the Second Ideal, spoken on a killing field
the oath that made me Radiant, the oath that made me real
not the spear, not the surgery, not the slave brands on my skin
but the Words, the Words, the Words that hold the storm within

[chorus]
turn back, turn back, every part of me says run
the bridges are behind us and the battle is undone
but Dalinar is fighting and his men are going to fall
and I cannot be the man who walks away, I cannot walk at all

tracks.title: Teft's Confession
tracks.prompt: sparse emotional post-rock, young male vocals, clean guitar arpeggios, cello underneath, Explosions in the Sky meets Godspeed, G minor, 68 BPM, grief and loyalty, quiet devastation
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
Teft came to Bridge Four with moss in his pockets
firemoss, the stuff that eats your soul by inches
he was an addict and a deserter and a liar
and he was the first man to believe in me when no one else would listen

he recognized the stormlight, he had seen it once before
his family were Envisagers, they died for what they saw
and he carried that guilt like a bridge across his shoulders
long before Sadeas put a real one at his door

[chorus]
Teft, old man, you taught me how to lead
you handed me the spear when I forgot how to bleed
you told me I was Radiant before I spoke a Word
and every oath I swore was one you helped me find the nerve

[verse 2]
he said the words himself eventually, Life before death
and Phendorana chose him, a spren with steady breath
but the moss was always there, the craving underneath
and Moash, Moash who I loved, put a knife beneath his teeth

Teft died in Urithiru while I was drowning in the dark
the tower was corrupted, Raboniel had left her mark
and I felt him go, I felt the bond dissolve like salt in rain
and something in the Windrunner broke that I cannot explain

[bridge]
he was not the best of us, he would have been the first to say
he was the loudest, gruffest, angriest man in the brigade
but he believed in Bridge Four more than anyone alive
and when they took him from us, something in the Fourth did not survive

[chorus]
Teft, old man, you taught me how to lead
you handed me the spear when I forgot how to bleed
you told me I was Radiant before I spoke a Word
and every oath I swore was one you helped me find the nerve

tracks.title: Dog and the Dragon
tracks.prompt: warm acoustic post-rock, young male vocals, fingerpicked guitar, gentle strings, Bon Iver meets The Album Leaf, Bb major, 72 BPM, bittersweet fable, tender and breaking
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
Wit told me a story about a dog who loved a dragon
the dog saw the dragon soar and breathe fire across the sky
and the dog tried everything, he climbed the cliffs, he swam the rapids
and every single time the dog could not learn how to fly

the villagers laughed at first and then they loved him for the trying
he saved the children from the flood, he pulled the cart from mud
he did a hundred quiet miracles while chasing what he was not
and he never knew the village saw the dragon in his blood

[chorus]
you are not broken, Kaladin, you are not what the brands say
you are not the deaths you carry, you are not the dark today
the dog was always good enough, the dog was always brave
the dragon that he chased was just the name for what he gave

[verse 2]
I sat in the darkness of the tower and the story sat with me
the Fourth Ideal was waiting but I could not make it breathe
I will accept that there are those I cannot protect
four words that cost me everything because they meant I was correct

Tien was one of those, and Dunny, and my mother's quiet faith
and every bridgeman buried in the chasms without a grave
the dog cannot save everyone, the dragon cannot either
and the story is not about the flying, it is about the fever

[bridge]
the fever to stand up when you cannot stand
the fever to reach out with a shaking hand
the fever to say the Words even when they burn
the dog does not become the dragon
the dog just learns

[chorus]
you are not broken, Kaladin, you are not what the brands say
you are not the deaths you carry, you are not the dark today
the dog was always good enough, the dog was always brave
the dragon that he chased was just the name for what he gave

tracks.title: The Fifth Ideal
tracks.prompt: transcendent post-rock finale, young male vocals, full orchestral swell with electric guitars, Sigur Ros meets Mono meets Explosions in the Sky, D major, 80 BPM, triumphant release, wall of sound resolving into light
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
I stood on the edge of Urithiru with the wind in every direction
the brands on my forehead glowing with the stormlight underneath
Syl beside me as a Blade, as a spear, as a ribbon of intention
and the sky opened up like it was finally time to breathe

Bridge Four on the ground below, the banner flying overhead
the crew that started as the dead men have become the living thread
Rock is home in the Peaks, Lopen has two arms and twice the jokes
Sigzil carries numbers, Skar and Drehy hold the cloaks

[chorus]
life before death, I speak it like a hymn
strength before weakness, I say it from the brim
journey before destination, every road I walk
I am the son of Lirin and I am the son of Rock

[verse 2]
my father wanted me to heal, not harm, and he was right
the spear was just the instrument, the purpose was the light
I thought I had to choose between the scalpel and the blade
but the truth is that protection and the healing are the same trade

Moash is out there somewhere with my friend's face and empty eyes
and I will grieve the man he was while fighting what he has become
not because he deserves my grief but because I deserve to feel
the Fourth Ideal taught me loss, the Fifth will teach me how to heal

[bridge]
I have been a surgeon's son, a soldier, and a slave
a bridgeman, a captain, a Radiant, a knave
but underneath the titles and the brands and all the scars
I am the wind, I am the storm, I am the space between the stars

[chorus]
life before death, I speak it like a hymn
strength before weakness, I say it from the brim
journey before destination, every road I walk
I am the son of Lirin and I am the son of Rock

[outro]
the wind rises over Roshar
and the bridgeman walks into it, unbranded, unbroken
he carries no bridge
only the sky
